name: Escape room: Lighthouse quest
description:
Escape rooms at the old lighthouse are exciting logic games for kids. Exciting adventures, puzzle, riddles, secret puzzles and unique escape room, where you need to find the exit, are waiting for you. A lot of levels consist of logic games, hidden objects, escape and other educational kids games which make one big adventure. Go together with Hippo through all the mysterious apartments to the very top of the lighthouse. Discover all its mysteries and riddles!

Hippo grandpa has got into the severe storm in the sea. And now only the bright light of the lighthouse could help him to escape dangerous cliffs and get to the seashore. But the way to the top of the lighthouse is long and dangerous, and we don't have so much time! Try to find all the hidden objects which help to open doors. Find key and solve clever puzzle to escape and get to the next level. But you need to not only open doors. Some apartments have secret passages, which open when player collects all puzzles of the riddle. Try different educational games for kids. Hurry up! You don't have much time for hidden objects in escape rooms. The faster you turn on the bright projector, the more chances grandpa has for survival.

Our escape rooms have the best and most exciting games for kids. Be the main character of this exciting story. Play free kids games for boys and girls together with your favorite kids characters.
developers: Hippo Baby Games for Girls and for Boys
